titles.title: Praise To The Lord The Almighty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, newline The King of creation! newline O my soul, praise Him, newline For He is thy health and salvation! newline All ye who hear, newline Now to His temple draw near; newline Join me in glad adoration!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise to the Lord, newline Who o'er all things newline So wondrously reigneth, newline Shelters thee under His wings, newline Yes, so gently sustaineth! newline Hast Thou not seen newline How all thy longings have been newline Granted in what He ordaineth?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Praise to the Lord! newline O let all that is in me adore Him! newline All that hath life and breath, newline Come now with praises before Him. newline Let the amen sound from His people again: newline Gladly for aye we adore Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Praise to the Lord, newline Who doth prosper newline Thy work and defend thee; newline Surely His goodness and mercy newline Here daily attend thee. newline Ponder anew what the Almighty can do, newline If with His love He befriend thee.
